title: Bangle Bracelet, "Egyptian Story", 2012
medium: Pockwood, turquoises, tsavorites, oxidized silver, white gold
markings: On the inside of the silver band below turquoises: "HEMMERLE"; the other half of the bangle with gold and silver standard marks: "Au 750" (for 18 K gold) "Ag 925" (for Sterling silver standard) surrounding a mark in the form of a rectangle with incuse letters "GH" (for Gebruder Hemmerle) with hammer in between
dimensions: H x W x D: 7 x 8 x 2.5 cm (2 3/4 in. x 3 1/8 in. x 1 in.)
description: Circular bangle form with flattened sides leading to rounded ends that almost touch, the two part bracelet joined at a seam in the pockwood at the middle of underside, with one half rotating on a pivoting hinge of 18 K white gold, the pockwood with alternating light and dark striations terminating in a band of alternating dark and light turquoises set in oxidized silver, the ends with inset darker and lighter green tsavorites within oxidized silver

tombstone.epitaph: Bangle Bracelet, "Egyptian Story", 2012. Pockwood, turquoises, tsavorites, oxidized silver, white gold. Gift of Fiona Druckenmiller. 2013-27-1.
